item.description:
For folks who can watch the BEYOND THE SECRET movie on Thurs, 1/15
See details here: http://lawofattractio...

Whether you've seen BEYOND THE SECRET or not, come join us on Saturday!

Time: 3 - 5 pm

- Come and share your comments, impressions and discuss what you've learned from "BEYOND THE SECRET".

More importantly, what do you plan to do with the information?

Let's help each other put a game plan in place that aligns with the Law Of Attraction principles, take action and stay committed.

- We'll also share with you the Secret of integrating the "BE-DE-HAVE" way of moving powerfully into your Intentions for 2009.


Light refreshments will be served.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Take ACTION with "BEYOND THE SECRET"
